name: Cards +1
description:
Cards +1 is a minimalist puzzle card game for mobile, completely free and without ads. The goal is simple: create card combinations with the same values.

To create card combinations, you must increase the value of the cards of your choice. Rapping on a card increases its value by 1. But you only have 4 points to spend, it's up to you! The game ends if you have failed to make a combination.

With the combinations you make, you increase your score and restore your action points. The longer and higher the value card chains, the more points you earn.

The principle seems simple to you? It is ! But be careful, the game is much more strategic and deep than it seems.

Moreover, many special cards, with very different effects, help you to survive as long as possible. Only if you use them correctly of course...

It's your turn to play! What score will you be able to achieve?

  • Completely free
  • No ads
  • Easy to understand, difficult to master
  • Special cards with stunning effects
  • English and French
